aboutUs.title: About us
aboutUs.subtitle: At KO'DJ, we are passionate about creating a thriving developer community in South Korea. Our events are designed to empower developers, inspire creativity, and foster collaboration.

mission.title: KO'DJ
mission.paragraph1: At KO'DJ, we believe in the power of collaboration and innovation. Our events are more than just meetups; they are platforms for transformative learning, meaningful connections, and groundbreaking ideas.
mission.paragraph2: By participating in KO'DJ events, you're not just attending an eventâ€”you're becoming part of a movement to elevate Uzbekistan's tech community to new heights. Let's create, learn, and grow together.
